item.title: The minorbsem package in R
item.description: I’ve been working on the minorbsem package in R since the start of February. It’s my first proper attempt at an R package. The package allows you fit Bayesian SEMs and meta-analytic SEMs while: accounting for the possibility that minor factors influence the correlation between items. adventitious error. The package is hosted on both GitHub and r-universe.dev. And the package website is https://jamesuanhoro.github.io/minorbsem/. I plan to actively develop this package over time.
